effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 1 million over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 541,567.

Set: When your Power Word: Shield is completely absorbed on an ally, they are granted Insurance! at 40% effectiveness. Allies with your Insurance! or absorption effects receive 15% increased healing from you.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 7,457 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 196 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to empower the Eye and grant you 398 Intellect up to 20 times, decaying rapidly upon leaving combat. While fully empowered, the Eye instead deals 68,231 Fire damage to enemies or heals allies for 155,079.
Equip: You champion the causes of your guild.  All guild reputation gains are increased by 100%.
